name: The Lalbagh Trail ~ by KoraWalks
description:
Join this walk by Korawalks to explore the wonderful delights that Lalbagh holds for all of us. Be it the amazing biodiversity of trees, plants, flowers, birds, insects, butterflies, or the interesting history behind our beloved botanical garden. 
REGISTER NOW

name: Back to Roots Residency ~ by Spudnik Farms
description:
Back to Roots is a residency program by Spudnik Farms aimed at creating spaces for interdisciplinary learning and fostering cultural exchanges that stimulate food innovation necessary for healthier and more prosperous communities. The goal is to unite the culinary expertise of chefs with the profound insights of local farmers, pushing the boundaries of what’s possible in the world of food. 
Spudnik Farms, +91 7349632966 +91 9900606698 
Residency Activities:  

Field trips and excursions to tuber-growing communities
Hands-on experience with tuber crop cultivation and harvesting
Workshops and talks by experts on tuber crops and sustainable agriculture
Collaborative recipe development and cooking sessions
Cultural exchanges and community engagement activities

Submission Instructions: 

Please submit your completed application form, along with any supporting materials (portfolio, website links, etc.) by 30th August 2024.
Selected participants will be notified by the end of September.

name: "Children Need Nature" - a national conference ~ by Karma Bhoomi Trust
description:
The Children need Nature conference is being offered to all by Prakriya Green Wisdom School and Bhoomi College with Karma Bhoomi Trust as the organiser. 
About the Conference: Many thought leaders and educationists would agree that all of us, children as well as adults will benefit from connecting to Nature, living a lifestyle that values Nature more. In addition, today there is increasing scientific research as well, that makes it clear that children need Nature for multiple reasons, not only for their physical and mental health, but also to improve their cognitive and creative abilities as well as their socio-emotional and personal growth. It is also becoming increasingly clear that it is essential to foster future generations who have a greater connect with Nature and a greater willingness to engage in climate action and practices for sustainability. What the world needs more than ever before are custodians and stewards of nature! It has become an imperative in times of acute climate crisis and nature disconnect. 
The purpose of this conference is to create a space for parents, educators and school administrators to share research findings and nature education practices and join a movement to include Nature education sessions in schools to care for the future of our children and the future of our planet. The organisers welcome you to be part of the conference! 
REGISTER NOW

location.name: NIMHANS Convention Centre, Hosur Road, Bengaluru-560029
